# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection. We're offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $999999. This is an exclusive opportunity not to be missed. Let's discuss how we can make this deal happen. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $999,999. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $999,999
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
